mapper.select: SELECT port, scheme, last_check_time, area, created_at, ip, ( connect_times / ( connect_times + disconnet_times ) ) connected_rate FROM proxy WHERE proxy.last_check_time IS NOT NULL AND is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY last_check_time DESC, connected_rate DESC, connect_times DESC limit #{offset} , #{limit}
select count(*) from proxy where last_check_time IS NOT NULL and is_deleted = 'N'

SELECT port, scheme, last_check_time, area, created_at, ip, ( connect_times / ( connect_times + disconnet_times ) ) connected_rate FROM proxy WHERE proxy.last_check_time IS NOT NULL AND is_deleted = 'N' and (scheme like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or area like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) ORDER BY last_check_time DESC, connected_rate DESC, connect_times DESC limit #{offset} , #{limit}
